about_the_game:
The Citybus o530 add-on for OMSI 2, depicts one of the most popular buses in Europe. Choose your favorite bus from 122 versions and 600 built-in repaints of the exterior and interior with upholstery from many cities. Personalize it with 83 setvars, offering 219 options of configuration, such as the type of seats, dashboard, displays, air conditioning, door type, and much more. Setvars can be configured in-game by a dedicated panel in the bus.

Vehicles represent city and suburban types (solo, CNG, Ü, MÜ, L, LÜ, G, GÜ, G CNG) with realistic 3D models, textures, and sounds. With Euro 2, Euro 3, and CNG engines. Versions differ in length, door arrangement, engines, and gearboxes. Buses have adjustable mirrors and a dashboard. Realistic control panels (two types) and a ticket printer manufactured in Poland (available in English, Polish, and German).

Realistic sounds for 8 engines: OM 906 hLA (E2), OM 906 hLA (E3), OM 906 LA (E2), OM 906 LA (E3), OM 457 hLA (E2), OM 457 hLA (E3), OM 457 LA (E3), M 447 hLAG (CNG), and 4 gearboxes: D854/D864 and 5HP/6HP.


  • 122 versions, differences:
    - lengths: 12m (solo, CNG, Ü), 13m (MÜ), 15m (L, LÜ), 18m articulated (G, GÜ, G CNG)
    - Door arrangement city: solo 2-2-0, 2-2-2; articulated 2-2-2-0, 2-2-2-2
    - Door arrangement suburban: solo 1-2-0, 2-2-0; articulated 1-2-2-0, 2-2-2-0
    - Engines: 8 types (different sounds for each)
    - Gearboxes: 4 types (different sounds)
  • Ingame setvar configurator panel
  • Adjustable mirrors and dashboard
  • Realistic control panel (two types) and ticket printer from Poland (available in English, Polish and German)
  • 83 setvars with 219 options of configuration
  • 600 realistic and semi realistic repaints of exterior and interior with different upholstery
  • Realistic 3d model, textures and sounds
  • Buses are repaintable

The Citybus o530 add-on for OMSI 2, depicts one of the most popular buses in Europe. Choose your favorite bus from 122 versions and 600 built-in repaints of the exterior and interior with upholstery from many cities. Personalize it with 83 setvars, offering 219 options of configuration, such as the type of seats, dashboard, displays, air conditioning, door type, and much more. Setvars can be configured in-game by a dedicated panel in the bus.

Vehicles represent city and suburban types (solo, CNG, Ü, MÜ, L, LÜ, G, GÜ, G CNG) with realistic 3D models, textures, and sounds. With Euro 2, Euro 3, and CNG engines. Versions differ in length, door arrangement, engines, and gearboxes. Buses have adjustable mirrors and a dashboard. name: OMSI 2 Add-on Citybus o530

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU with 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU with 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The Citybus o530 add-on for OMSI 2, depicts one of the most popular buses in Europe. Choose your favorite bus from 122 versions and 600 built-in repaints of the exterior and interior with upholstery from many cities.
supported_languages:
English, German*, French
*languages with full audio support
